General.Name: Integra Indocabinet Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk manufactures and sells wooden furniture and other wooden products in the United States, Asia, and Europe. It operates through forestry, manufacturing, and commercial business of its wooden products. The company offers knockdown furniture; bedroom/case good furniture; project furniture; and building components, such as millwork, plywood, truck flooring, wooden blind, doors, and wall panels. It also holds forest concession rights. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Integra Indo Lestari.

3.Name: Mr. Wendy  Chandra
3.Title: Company Sec. & Head of Investor Relations
